txt.en: 'If the cub fled from its mother, she must have also been in danger.'
Elrohir has noticed growling coming from somewhere down the road.\n\nYou should find the source.

'Did you hear that?' Elrohir exchanges a look with you and Elladan.

Then you hear growls coming from somewhere up ahead.

Elrohir narrows his eyes. 'Approach quietly.'
''Tis fortunate -- I doubt that was the last of them.'
According to the Galadhrim, Lothlórien has been peaceful. Regardless, Gwaihir's news of the wolf presence along the Anduin occupies your minds.

'Shathur-munzu is a dwarf-ruin to the north, in the Vales of Anduin. Its history is not a happy one, but my brother and I have our own reasons for loathing the place. We... found our mother there, tortured by the Orcs. Even after our father healed her wounds, she could no longer bear to continue living in Middle-earth. The hurt had gone too deep. So she sailed West, to the Undying Lands.

'The thought often crosses my mind -- in the end, will I sail and reunite with her? Or shall I remain in Middle-earth and never see her again?

'...Forgive me. I did not mean to discuss such dark matters. If that Warg came from the Vales, then its brethren may be haunting the northern reaches of Lothlórien. We ought to continue towards Caras Galadhon. Once we gather more information there, we can decide on what to do next.'

For a moment, the twins linger to watch the bear cub and its mother. Elrohir breaks the silence first.

'Shall we?'
'The cub must have better hearing than we do!'
'I didn't leave Shathur-munzu to fall to the likes of you...!'
You have discovered wolves surrounding a bear cub.\n\nYou should defeat the wolves.
'I hope we aren't too late to help her.'
'But what is a Warg doing here? Are the wolves following it?'

'It seems Elrohir's suspicions about the wolves were correct.'
 
Elladan's gaze falls upon the bear cub, which stares at your group warily.
 
'This little one must have gotten separated from its mother. Shall we help it return to her?' He smiles gently.
The bear cub must have gotten separated from its mother.\n\nYou should follow the cub and help reunite it with its mother.
Mission: The Further Adventures of Elladan & Elrohir, Chapter 4
You have found the cub's mother surrounded by wolves and a Warg.\n\nYou should help the bear and defeat them.
Elrohir wishes to explain the situation to you.\n\nYou should talk to him.
Defeat the Warg and the wolves
'There's the mother! Her injuries are not serious.'
Find the source of the growling
'If we never hear that name again, it will be too soon.'
'Oh, it's already leaving. I suppose it tired of us standing around.'
